message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $125. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price!
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer it to you for $122. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm getting close, but I still think I can do better. Would you be willing to go down to $118?
I'm almost there, Bob! I can offer it to you for $119. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price!
I'm really close, but I think I can get it even lower. Would you be willing to go down to $117?
I'm not willing to go any lower than this, Bob. I can offer it to you for $119.99. It's a final offer, and I think it's a great deal!
